TopicTitle: Action group part not expanding/collapsing on first click

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: Build ID 10624168

Operating System and version: Windows 11 / Version 22H2

CPU and GPU models: AMD 5800X / NVIDIA RTX 3700 / 32GB RAM

Description of the bug: In the action menu, parts do not always expand/collapse on first click

Expected Behavior: Parts expand/collapse on the first click

Observed Behavior: In the action menu, parts do not always expand/collapse on first click

Steps to Replicate: Click a part in the action menu

Fixes / Workarounds: Click the part a second time

A list of ALL mods: No mods installed

Recording of behavior: https://imgur.com/BrdJMWz

Edited February 26, 2023 by launch-stability-enhancer
The unresponsive behavior is also occurring when selecting which property to control, not just the list populating.
